about.title: Who Am I?
about.quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it
about.description2: , and also aspiring to become a
about.description3: I started learning JavaScript in 2021, and my major is Information Technology.
about.description4: Luckily, during my second year at university, I found a pretty good internship. I am always grateful to the mentors who passionately and diligently trained me during that time.
about.description5: I am continually striving to improve myself. Everything I know, I share wholeheartedly in the hope that it will be of some help to others.
about.description6: Oh, there’s a quote I really cherish, which is:
about.description7: So, just go for it and don’t be afraid, everyone! Hehe.
